Kashira:
Masamune (正宗)

Category: Male

– Click image to view.

Plays:

Yoshitsune and a Thousand Cherry Trees (Yoshitsune senbonzakura / 義経千本桜)

The Shiraishi Story (Go taiheiki shiraishi banashi / 碁太平記白石噺)

The Summer Festival at Naniwa (Natsumatsuri Naniwa kagami / 夏祭浪花鑑)

The Crossroads of Gappo (Sesshū Gappō ga Tsuji / 摂州合邦辻)

The Story of the Morning Glory (Shōutsushi asagao banashi / 生写朝顔話)

The Vow of Rokusuke (Hikosan gongen chikai no sukedachi / 彦山権現誓助剣)

Kumagai at the Fan Shop (Suma no miyako genpei tsutsuji / 須磨都源平躑躅)

The Two Butterflies (Futatsu chōchō kuruwa nikki / 双蝶々曲輪日記)

The Two-Colored Reins (Koinyōbō somewake tazuna / 恋女房染分手綱)

The New Usuyuki Story (Shin usuyuki monogatari / 新薄雪物語)

Kajiwara The Swordsman (Miura no Ōsuke kōbai Tazuna / 三浦大助紅梅たづな)

The Eternal Love of Onatsu and Seijurō (Kotobuki renri no matsu / 寿連理の松)

The Feudal Lord in Asama (Asama no tonosama / 浅間の殿様)

The Stone Monument of Glory (Hana no ueno homare no ishibumi / 花上野誉碑)
